name: Spite: the witch god
description:
"An evil god has become the ruler of a once peaceful land. You awake from your tomb to drive the evil god back to the void."

Takes place in a swamp.
4 toxic levels in a swamp.
Many swap based enemies to face.
Hack n' Slash swamp action.
Swampy bois.

Student game.
Top down hack n' slash developed by team Shockwave at The Game Assembly.

Credits:

Art
Henrik Andersson - Maximilian Bergström - Pontus Canbäck - Dennis Praetorius 

Level Design
Jonas Astberg - Hannes Bensryd - Oscar Maris

Programming
Mattias Anderson -Mattias Blomgren - Karl Brunzell - Henrik Phan - Mikkel Ravnholt

Technical Art
Adam Andersson - Nathalie Börgesen - Dan Sönne

Original Release: 13/02/2019
2nd project developed by Shockwave.
